trans-unit.source: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that initiate or perform a single, unambiguous action and do not maintain state when activated.
trans-unit.target: 公开方法和属性，以支持 UI 自动化客户端访问的启动或执行单个明确操作并且不维护状态激活时的控件。

trans-unit.source: Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePattern> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 实现 UI 自动化提供程序必须支持上<xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePattern>控件模式。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePattern>

trans-unit.source: Controls implement IInvokeProvider if the same behavior is not exposed through another control pattern provider.
trans-unit.target: 如果不通过另一个控件模式提供程序公开同一行为，则控件实现 IInvokeProvider。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePattern.Invoke%2A> method on a control performs the same action as the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Expand%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Collapse%2A> method, the control should not implement IInvokeProvider.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePattern.Invoke%2A>控件上的方法执行相同的操作<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Expand%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Collapse%2A>方法，该控件不应实现 IInvokeProvider。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Collapse%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapsePattern.Expand%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePattern.Invoke%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sends a request to activate a control and initiate its single, unambiguous action.
trans-unit.target: 发送请求以激活控件并启动其单一、 明确的操作。

trans-unit.source: Invoke is an asynchronous call and must return immediately without blocking.
trans-unit.target: 调用是一个异步调用，必须立即返回而不阻止。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This behavior is particularly critical for controls that, directly or indirectly, launch a modal dialog when invoked.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 这一点尤为重要，因为控件的直接或间接启动模式对话框时调用。

trans-unit.source: Any UI Automation client that instigated the event will remain blocked until the modal dialog is closed.
trans-unit.target: 直到模式对话框关闭，则引发该事件的任何 UI 自动化客户端将保持阻止状态。

trans-unit.source: If possible, the event should be raised after the control has completed its associated action.
trans-unit.target: 如果可能，在控件完成其关联的操作后，应引发事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePatternIdentifiers.InvokedEvent> should be raised before servicing the Invoke request in the following scenarios: - It is not possible or practical to wait until the action is complete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePatternIdentifiers.InvokedEvent>在服务 Invoke 请求在以下方案之前，应引发:-不可能或实际等待操作完成。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.InvokePatternIdentifiers.InvokedEvent>

trans-unit.source: - The action is time-consuming and will cause the calling client to block for a significant length of time.
trans-unit.target: -此操作很耗时，而且会导致调用的客户端阻塞相当长的时间。

trans-unit.source: If the control is not enabled.
